CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper December 29, 1951, pg. 13, reads: "Budding Artist - A Promising Art Student and Her Work... Center: Hard at work on 'Scotch and Soda,' the Tech musical comedy. Pretty girl, pretty music, what more can you ask for?... - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Peggy Owens (Skillen) seated at piano and writing in notebook
